column4: I have some special driver for my webcam which is not supported by the kernel yet. I have to do modprobe and insmod if i want to use it. Is it possible to enable the webcam at startup?
i can only give you half the answer, yes its possible but i forget how to do it =p just google, "ubuntu modprobe on startup"
i think i found something, thanks
if that doesn't work just ask here again somebody will eventually come on that knows
